docs.snippet: The Communists, like the poor, are always with us, and Latin America is no exception. In recent weeks we have seen Russian diplomatic representatives expelled from Mexico and Argentina for being involved in strikes of violence. Red nationals in both...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Communists, like the poor, are always with us, and Latin America is no exception. In recent weeks we have seen Russian diplomatic representatives expelled from Mexico and Argentina for being involved in strikes of violence. Red nationals in both these countries were arrested. In Uruguay the Government was reported recently to be considering a rupture of diplomatic relations with the Soviet Union.
